logging.title: Application Logs
logging.description: View, search, and export application logs
logging.settingsDescription: Configure log levels, transports, and retention policies

logLevel.title: Log Level
logLevel.description: Set the minimum log level. Logs below this level will be ignored.
logLevel.warnDesc: Warning conditions that may need attention
logLevel.fatalDesc: Critical errors that may cause system failure

options.includeStackTraceDesc: Include stack traces for error and fatal logs
options.includeSourceDesc: Include file name and line number (development only)

transports.title: Log Transports
transports.description: Configure where logs are sent and stored.
transports.indexedDBDesc: Persist logs locally for viewing in Log Viewer
transports.langfuseDesc: Send logs to Langfuse for AI observability

retention.title: Log Retention
retention.description: Configure how long logs are kept and storage limits.
retention.maxEntriesDesc: Older logs will be automatically removed when limit is reached
retention.maxAgeDaysDesc: Logs older than this will be automatically cleaned up

performanceNote.title: Performance Note
performanceNote.description: Enabling stack traces and source location may impact performance in production. Log sampling is recommended for high-traffic applications.
